job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's degree in IT, Computer Science, Business Administration, or related field

jd: From: Akiv Khan, Tek inspiration LLC akiv.khan@tekinspirations.com Reply to: akiv.khan@tekinspirations.com Job Description -Title: ServiceNow Project ManagerDuration: 6 Monthslocation: Sacramento, California (hybrid)Sacramento, California based clientVisa: GC/USC Target Rate – 60/hr on C2CCandidate must have LinkedIn and must be local to CA. We are seeking a ServiceNow Project Manager for a hybrid role with our Sacramento, California based client. This position requires 2 days/week on-site as directed by the client.Responsibilities include:• Lead and manage ServiceNow projects from initiation to completion, ensuring all objectives are met within budget and on schedule• Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, analysts, and client stakeholders, to define project scope, goals, deliverables, and timelines• Develop and maintain project plans, resource scheduling, budget tracking, and risk management strategies• Communicate effectively with clients to understand their requirements and expectations, and provide timely updates on project progress• Ensure project quality and compliance with ServiceNow best practices and standards• Identify and resolve project issues and risks, and escalate as needed to ensure project success• Conduct project post-mortems and identify areas for improvement for future projectsRequirements:• Bachelor's degree in IT, Computer Science, Business Administration, or related field• Minimum 4 years of experience in IT project management, specifically with ServiceNow projects• ServiceNow certification(s) preferred• Strong leadership, communication, and problem-solving skills• Proven ability to manage multiple projects concurrently and meet deadlines• Experience in Agile project management methodologies• Knowledge of ITIL practices and principles
